queries.sql: SELECT m.*,r.* FROM app_menu m LEFT JOIN app_role r ON r.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN app_group g ON r.group_id = g.group_id WHERE r.group_id='4' AND m.deleted_at IS NULL AND m.aktif='1' AND r.akses_lihat='1' ORDER BY urutan ASC;
SELECT m.*,r.* FROM app_menu m LEFT JOIN app_role r ON r.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN app_group g ON r.group_id = g.group_id WHERE m.prefik='susunan-skp' ;
SELECT ps.kegiatan,ps.angka_kredit FROM susunan_skp ps INNER JOIN pegawai peg ON ps.nip=peg.nip WHERE peg.jabatan='Analis Jabatan' GROUP BY LOWER(ps.kegiatan)
